content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No composite structures have been successfully created on the map in these steps. Several recovery attempts were made to place a Lab at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but all placement efforts failed. No other multi-entity structures (such as power generators, mining setups, or factories) have been added to the map.

ERROR TIPS
• API parameter usage errors
  – When calling get_entities, avoid using unsupported keywords (for example, “radius”) and verify the function’s signature to prevent passing unexpected positional arguments.
• Placement validation errors
  – Confirm that the necessary items (such as a Lab) are present in the inventory before attempting placement at a designated coordinate.
• Iteration over missing entities
  – Check that the result of an entity retrieval call is not None before iterating over it to avoid “NoneType” errors.
• Crafting resource shortages
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (for instance, iron-gear-wheels and electronic-circuits) are available before attempting to craft a Lab. This includes verifying that prerequisite smelting and intermediate production steps are complete so that crafting recipes can be satisfied.
